main.window

Class AdminPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • main.window.AdminPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class AdminPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This class provide admin activities for the user, It has three different panel to provide configure the system, set schedule and generate bill. It also has button to go to simulation
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
